revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Kalos Power Plant |image = [[File:Kalos Power Plant.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Kalos Power Plant. |tokens = 575,000 |location = South of Route 13 }} '''Kalos Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
== Random Encounters ==

Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | '''[[File:Volcanion.png|40px]] Volcanion*''' || <center> 83,945,700 || [[File:Team_Flare_Aliana.png|40px]] Team Flare Aliana || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena || <center> 75,384,400 |- |}
'''*Must be Kalos Champion and have cleared Kalos Power Plant at least 5 times to unlock Volcanion'''
